word:
Let us strive to be Christians (Christ-like) in every sense of the word, and let our dress, conversation and actions preach that Christ is formed within, the hope of glory, and that we are looking for that blessed hope and glorious appearing of Jesus. . . . My affections, interest, treasure, all, is in the bright world to come. I long to see the King in His beauty. 
                                                                           353
